Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Authorizes the village of Endicott to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan
Summary: Authorizes the village of Endicott to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to Police Officer Jennifer Quinn who is employed by such village.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the village of Endicott to offer an optional twenty year retirement plan to a certain police officer employed by such village
